props.activeClass: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active. You can find more information about the [**active-class** prop](https://router.vuejs.org/api/#active-class) on the vue-router documentation.
props.appendIcon: Appends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.group: Assign a route namespace. Accepts a string or regexp for determining active state
props.noAction: Removes left padding assigned for action icons from group items
props.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.subGroup: Designate the component as nested list group

slots.appendIcon: Appends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
slots.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
